alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Goshen, eastern Laramie and southeastern Platte Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Chugwater, or 30 miles southeast of Wheatland, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 55 to 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluffs, La Grange, Burns, Chugwater, Albin, Hillsdale, Hawk Springs Campground, Hawk Springs Recreation Area, Meriden Rest Area, Gun Barrel, Carpenter and Slater. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 42 and 53. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 380 and 401. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County
